channel.title: Landslide on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for Natural Disaster Assessment (Floods, Landslides, Wildfires)
item.description:
Field workflows

  • Rapid damage assessments
  • Hazard and access mapping
  • Infrastructure impact documentation

Works with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Coordinate across teams with shared projects, permissions, and change tracking.
